Chinese.name: 腾讯云IM Usersig 生成
Chinese.description: 快速为User ID生成腾讯云IM Usersig。
Chinese.attention: 使用前，请配置环境变量”SDK_APP_ID“及”SECRET“，这两个字段可在腾讯云IM应用控制台首页找到。

English.name: generate-usersig-for-tencent-cloud-im
English.description: Generating the Usersig for each userID of Tencent Cloud IM.
English.attention: Please specify `SDK_APP_ID` and `SECRET`, which can be found on the console of your APP of Tencent Cloud IM.
